SALT_SIZE - Static variable in class org.albertschmitt.crypto.AESService
The size in bytes of the salt.
setAesKey(byte[]) - Method in class org.albertschmitt.crypto.AESService
Sets the AES key that was retrieved by the getAesKey() method.
setAESKeySize(int) - Static method in class org.albertschmitt.crypto.AESService
Inherit from this class and call this function in the constructor to set the key size if you want it to be 128 bits instead of the default.
